 052:     """Speaker diarization pipeline
 053: 
 054:     Parameters
 055:     ----------
 056:     sad_scores : Text or Path or 'oracle', optional
 057:         Describes how raw speech activity detection scores
 058:         should be obtained. It can be either the name of a torch.hub model, or
 059:         the path to the output of the validation step of a model trained
 060:         locally, or the path to scores precomputed on disk.
 061:         Defaults to "@sad_scores", indicating that protocol
 062:         files provide the scores in the corresponding "sad_scores" key.
 063:         Use 'oracle' to assume perfect speech activity detection.
 064:     scd_scores : Text or Path or 'oracle', optional
 065:         Describes how raw speaker change detection scores
 066:         should be obtained. It can be either the name of a torch.hub model, or
 067:         the path to the output of the validation step of a model trained
 068:         locally, or the path to scores precomputed on disk.
 069:         Defaults to "@scd_scores", indicating that protocol
 070:         files provide the scores in the corresponding "scd_scores" key.
 071:         Use 'oracle' to assume perfect speech turn segmentation,
 072:         `sad_scores` should then be set to 'oracle' too.
 073:     embedding : Text or Path, optional
 074:         Describes how raw speaker embeddings should be obtained. It can be
 075:         either the name of a torch.hub model, or the path to the output of the
 076:         validation step of a model trained locally, or the path to embeddings
 077:         precomputed on disk. Defaults to "@emb" that indicates that protocol
 078:         files provide the embeddings in the "emb" key.
 079:     metric : {'euclidean', 'cosine', 'angular'}, optional
 080:         Metric used for comparing embeddings. Defaults to 'cosine'.
 081:     method : {'pool', 'affinity_propagation'}
 082:         Clustering method. Defaults to 'pool'.
 083:     evaluation_only : `bool`
 084:         Only process the evaluated regions. Default to False.
 085:     purity : `float`, optional
 086:         Optimize coverage for target purity.
 087:         Defaults to optimizing diarization error rate.
 088: 
 089:     Hyper-parameters
 090:     ----------------
 091:     min_duration : `float`
 092:         Do not cluster speech turns shorter than `min_duration`. Assign them to
 093:         the closest cluster (of long speech turns) instead.
 094:     """
 095:

 310:     """Speaker diarization pipeline introduced in Yin et al., 2018
 311: 
 312:     Ruiqing Yin, Hervé Bredin, and Claude Barras. "Neural speech turn
 313:     segmentation and affinity propagation for speaker diarization".
 314:     Interspeech 2018.
 315: 
 316:     Parameters
 317:     ----------
 318:     sad_scores : Text or Path or 'oracle', optional
 319:     scd_scores : Text or Path, optional
 320:         Describes how raw speech activity and speaker change detection scores
 321:         should be obtained. It can be either the name of a torch.hub model, or
 322:         the path to the output of the validation step of a model trained
 323:         locally, or the path to scores precomputed on disk. Defaults to
 324:         "@sad_scores" and "@scd_scores" respectively, indicating that protocol
 325:         files provide the scores in the corresponding "sad_scores" and
 326:         "scd_scores" keys. Use 'oracle' to assume perfect speech activity detection.
 327:         Path to precomputed speaker change detection scores
 328:     embedding : Text or Path, optional
 329:         Describes how raw speaker embeddings should be obtained. It can be
 330:         either the name of a torch.hub model, or the path to the output of the
 331:         validation step of a model trained locally, or the path to embeddings
 332:         precomputed on disk. Defaults to "@emb" that indicates that protocol
 333:         files provide the embeddings in the "emb" key.
 334:     metric : {'euclidean', 'cosine', 'angular'}, optional
 335:         Metric used for comparing embeddings. Defaults to 'cosine'.
 336:     evaluation_only : `bool`
 337:         Only process the evaluated regions. Default to False.
 338:     """
 339:
